para.text: Index Files or Indexes through a callback

para.text: The RDD can work with both physical index files (SDX files) but can also get the index information through callback methods from the running application.

para.text: No other information is needed. The physical sorting is done by the server. The RDD uses the information mentioned to generate a column list for the Create Index statement that it sends to the server, and also to generate an order by clause and where clause when seeking information.
The default behaviour of the RDD is to retrieve index information from the Metadataprovider. You can also open a physical SDX file. This is an INI file that contains the index expressions.
